ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.Controller.ATasks

Class favouriteTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Boolean>
      • ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.Controller.ATasks.favouriteTask

  • public class favouriteTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Boolean>
    Provides an AsyncTask subclass that processes a request to add a Content object to a User object's favourites field in the elastic search database.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.os.AsyncTask
